name: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids in a small town uncover a series of supernatural events and government conspiracies.

name: The Crown
description: A dramatized history of the reign of Queen Elizabeth II and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

name: Money Heist
description: A criminal mastermind known as 'The Professor' plans the biggest heist in history: to print billions of euros in the Royal Mint of Spain.

name: Car Masters: Rust to Riches
description: The crew at Gotham Garage takes classic cars from rust to high-end custom builds that bring in serious money.

name: Lovely Runner
description: A fast-paced romantic drama centered around a marathon runner who overcomes personal struggles to find love and success.
